channel.title: Games whitout NK are fun
channel.description:
I just played a game where possessor died n1, and i honnestly find those games to be more fun. I remember back when there was a bug and there was no NK, i actually liked it more.
I find these games easier to win, and less luck based. Nk eats away a % of BD and unseen's win rate.
Anyone else prefer the games whitout an NK? They do last longer, but they often feel more interesting.

item.title: Games whitout NK are fun
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
I liked it better when you weren’t sure.

2 NK? 1 NK? 0 NK? It was always a mystery, kept people on their toes.

Now it’s… okay there IS one NK, did anyone get possessed? Okay it’s a Reaper. Once we get him we’re in the clear.

Oh someone didn’t connect? Well, there aren’t any NKs then, so focus on getting cult/unseen.

Read full topic

item.title: Games whitout NK are fun
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
NK killing a Cult member is disastrous

Killing an Unseen or hitting the MM isn’t a big deal

Read full topic

item.title: Games whitout NK are fun
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I agree actually. Cult tend to do better without NK than unseen do.

Read full topic

item.title: Games whitout NK are fun
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
I don’t have any numbers to backup my claim, but i think a no NK game isn’t that bad for cult.

You have more convertable targets, and you are sure your guys won’t get random killed.

I mean, lets just say right now NK wins maybe 15%, BD maybe 40% and unseen/cult 45%. If we remove the NK i think it becomes closer to 50/50.

Read full topic

item.title: Games whitout NK are fun
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Floofyboy:

easier to win

I assume you were playing as BD then lol. Not having an NK makes it incredibly biased towards BD winning, especially in a cult game.

Read full topic
